name: Thomas was a shape (LD35)
description:
Made in 48h for Ludum Dare 35 using GameMaker: Studio.

You can now experience a complete ripoff of Thomas was Alone, but where you morph into the other characters instead of switching to them, brought to you by the amazing (not really) developer, pta2002!

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows to move
  • Space to jump
  • Number keys to shapeshift

Rate game here

NOTE: Linux/OS X users can run the game on WINE, make sure it's up to date.
